channel.title: Can Anyone Post these commands?
channel.description: First Command I need: [b]::npc Npcid And it spawns it[/b] Please make sure the command works. Second Command I need: [b]::emote (emoteid) Does emote/gfx w\e[/b] Please make sure the command works. Third Command I need: [b]::gfx "GfxId" Does that Gfx[/b] Please make sure all the commands work,And when you compile You Should Get no errors. All help appreciated,Thanks!

item.title: Can Anyone Post these commands?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

try this one if (command.startsWith("npc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Can Anyone Post these commands?

and i think emote[/quote]Thanks Hippie,I’ll do that and give you credits
Playermanny2,I got an error.LOL

client.java:12509: newNPC(int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,boolean) in NP CHandler cannot be applied to (int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int) server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Help please?

@playermanny2 wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 0) { try { int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); if (emote < 3217 && emote > 0) { startAnimation(emote); } else { sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad emote ID"); } }

else if (command.startsWith("npc")) { try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }*/
